sourcesContent:
My To-Do List

  • {{item.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface Item { name: string; completed: boolean; } @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { items: Item[] = []; newItem: string = ''; constructor() { const storedItems = localStorage.getItem('items'); if (storedItems) { this.items = JSON.parse(storedItems); } } addItem(): void { this.items.push({ name: this.newItem, completed: false }); console.log(this.newItem) this.newItem = ''; this.saveItems(); } editItem(index: number): void { const newName = prompt('Enter a new name', this.items[index].name); if (newName) { this.items[index].name = newName; this.saveItems(); } } removeItem(index: number): void { this.items.splice(index, 1); this.saveItems(); } saveItems(): void { localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(this.items)); } }
